description.heading: Product Detail
description.detail: With the HRX Men's Active T-shirt, you're in for a style treat. This t-shirt is cut to fit you perfectly and crafted from fabric that will keep you cool and dry throughout the day.

description.heading: Features
description.detail:
Textured waffle knit fabric allows for quick sweat distribution and helps you stay cool
Advanced Rapid Dry Technology processed at the yarn level wicks sweat & dries fast
N9 Anti-odor technology prevents the growth of odour-causing microbes keeping you fresh & hygienic all day
Active T-shirt for your daily workouts
Anti-Microbial technology keeps odor-causing microbes away
Textured waffle knit fabric allows for quick sweat distribution and helps you stay cool
Raglan sleeves help in unrestricted arm & shoulder movement
Style: Collared Polo Neck
Sleeve: Short Sleeves
Colour: Black
Print: Self Design
Fit: Regular
